sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Reserve Ticket">65a29ceac3941a10fbf6b8e1b4013199</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>onLoadClientScript</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {

}

function loadTheaters() {
    if (g_form.getValue('movie') == '' || g_form.getValue('date') == '' || g_form.getValue('time') == '') {
        g_form.clearOptions("theater");
        g_form.clearOptions("seat_type");
        g_form.clearOptions("seat_number");
        g_form.hideFieldMsg('seat_number');
        return;
    }

    g_form.clearOptions("theater");
    g_form.clearOptions("seat_type");
    g_form.clearOptions("seat_number");
    g_form.hideFieldMsg('seat_number');
    var getTheaters = new GlideAjax('GetTheaters');
    getTheaters.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getTheaters');
    getTheaters.addParam('sysparm_movie_name', g_form.getValue('movie'));
    getTheaters.addParam('sysparm_date', g_form.getValue('date'));
    getTheaters.addParam('sysparm_time', g_form.getValue('time'));
    getTheaters.getXMLAnswer(populateTheater);

    function populateTheater(response) {
        var set = new Set();
        var theaters = JSON.parse(response);
        for (var i = 0; i < theaters.length; i++) {
            if (set.has(theaters[i].sys_id) == false)
                g_form.addOption("theater", theaters[i].sys_id, theaters[i].name);
            set.add(theaters[i].sys_id);
        }
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-09-07 10:26:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>114981f8c3605ed0fbf6b8e1b40131c4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onLoadClientScript</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Movie Ticket Reservation App" source="x_1509691_movie_0">5a9e8f52c3d89610fbf6b8e1b401316e</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Movie Ticket Reservation App">5a9e8f52c3d89610fbf6b8e1b401316e</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_114981f8c3605ed0fbf6b8e1b40131c4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-07 10:26:38</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><va_supported>false</va_supported><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
